questions.questionText: If a train travels 120 km in 2 hours, what is its speed?

A can do work in 10 days, B can do it in 15 days. Together they can finish in?
If 8 men can complete work in 12 days, how many men are needed to complete it in 6 days?
A can do a work in 20 days. B is 25% more efficient than A. B alone can complete the work in?
A and B can do work in 12 days, B and C in 15 days, C and A in 20 days. How long will A take alone?

A works twice as fast as B. If B can complete work in 12 days, working together they finish in?
A can do work in 8 days, B can do it in 12 days. After working together for 3 days, A leaves. B completes remaining work in?

A and B together complete 5/8 of work, B and C together complete 7/12 of work. Who is most efficient?
A car travels at 60 km/h for 3 hours. What distance does it cover?
A man walks at 5 km/h and reaches 10 minutes late. If he walks at 6 km/h, he reaches 5 minutes early. Find distance?

A man can row 15 km/h in still water. If stream flows at 3 km/h, what is his speed upstream?

Average of 5 consecutive numbers is 20. Find largest number?

Statement: All intelligent are hardworking. Conclusion: Some hardworking are intelligent.
Statement: No animal is plant. Conclusion: All plants are animals.
Statement: Some books are pens. Conclusion: All pens are books.
Statement: All teachers are educated. Some educated are doctors. Conclusion: Some teachers are doctors.
Statement: Quality of education is deteriorating. Conclusion: Educated people are decreasing.
Statement: All roses are flowers. All flowers are beautiful. Conclusion: All roses are beautiful.
Statement: Some cats are dogs. All dogs bark. Conclusion: Some cats bark.
Statement: No pen is pencil. Conclusion: No pencil is pen.
Statement: Reading is good habit. Conclusion: All readers are good people.
Statement: All mangoes are fruits. Conclusion: All fruits are mangoes.
Statement: "Use our toothpaste for healthy teeth" - Advertisement. Assumption: People want healthy teeth.
Statement: Please do not use lift while going down. Assumption: Lift is not functioning.
Statement: Buy this car - it has power steering. Assumption: People prefer power steering.
Statement: School will remain closed tomorrow. Assumption: Students can read the notice.
Statement: Warning: Smoking is injurious to health. Assumption: People can read.
Statement: Interview on Sunday at 10 AM. Assumption: Candidate will be available on Sunday.
Statement: Study hard to get good marks. Assumption: Studying leads to good marks.
Statement: Join our gym to lose weight. Assumption: People want to lose weight.
Statement: Keep your valuables in locker. Assumption: Lockers are safe.
Statement: Bring your ID proof. Assumption: Everyone has ID proof.
